title: Syntactic Strictures: Chomsky's Legacy in Linguistics
description:
In this one my colleague Mitch and I discuss Noam Chomsky's legacy and place in the field of linguistics.

*Note: At the 36:29 mark Mitch references this syntactic tree: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Minimalist_program#/media/File:Propositional_Evidence_of_CP_phase.png
